intro: Sphenostylis wildemaniana, commonly known as the wildemaniana sphenostylis, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many species of shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves and small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale yellow. It often grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and less-studied species.
